thread.title: Watch: Confident Allen Crabbe shines in Trail Blazers' preseason win over Warriors
thread.title_full: Watch: Confident Allen Crabbe shines in Trail Blazers' preseason win over Warriors | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Meagher | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Watch: Confident Allen Crabbe shines in Trail Blazers' preseason win over Warriors
text:
The man with the nickname "Cool Breeze" enjoyed a hot evening Thursday night at the Moda Center as Allen Crabbe helped the Portland Trail Blazers continue an impressive start to the preseason with a 118-101 win over the Golden State Warriors.
Crabbe, the third-year wing, was on from the get-go, leading the Blazers with 25 points in 25 minutes on 9 of 12 shooting, including 5 of 6 from three-point range. His play was a continuation of a strong September and October for the former Cal product.
"Allen's been on a roll ever since the week before training camp," Blazers coach Terry Stotts said. "I like how aggressive he his. He's taking good shots. He's playing within himself and playing with a lot of confidence."
In the video above, Stotts, Crabbe and Damian Lillard discuss the the impressive play of "Cool Breeze" in Portland's win Thursday.
